title: Federal cabinet gives nod to budgetary proposals for fiscal 2020-21
content:
ISLAMABAD, Jun 12 (APP):The federal cabinet on Friday approved the budgetary proposals for fiscal 2020-21, in a special meeting chaired by the Prime Minister Imran Khan here.
During the meeting, the cabinet discussed and approved the proposals of budget 2020-21 that focused on economic stability, revenue generation and uplifting the business, industry and poor people particularly in the
wake of the COVID-19 situation.
Later on, the proposals were presented before the National Assembly for consideration.
